Activity: Log in and check emails. Respond to any urgent matters.
Review the progress of EHR integration with @ehrdev-1 and @ehrdev-2. Address any roadblocks or challenges encountered.
Meet with @qatest-1 and @qatest-2 to discuss the testing plan for the modified workflows and the implemented prompts. Ensure that the testing plan covers all aspects of the system.
Participate in the initial testing of the prompts in the test environment. Provide feedback to the developers on any issues or areas for improvement.
Refine the training plan based on the feedback from the testing team. Include specific examples and scenarios to help users understand how to use the new system.
Work with @ehrv-1 to resolve data mapping and interoperability issues. Ensure that the data captured from the prompts is accurately transferred to other systems.
Develop a communication plan to inform stakeholders about the upcoming changes to the EHR system. Clearly communicate the benefits of the new system and the training opportunities available.
Consult with @da-1 and @da-2 regarding data extraction for influenza trend analysis. Ensure that the data is structured for easy reporting and analysis.
Document and communicate the project's progress, including challenges and accomplishments. This helps everyone stay informed and coordinated.
